physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Postoperative respiratory distress with audible wheezing, increased inspiratory effort, arterial desaturation (down to 75%), and generalized cutaneous erythema.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Skin rash disappeared over the next 3 hours, and cardiopulmonary condition dramatically improved; oxygen saturation stabilized after withdrawal of adrenaline infusion.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Cardiovascular collapse with signs of severe bronchospasm, facial and neck redness.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After administration of 2 mg epinephrine, systolic blood pressure increased to 75 mmHg, heart rate decreased to 110 bpm.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe pulmonary hypertension before CPB, improvement after inhaled iloprost administration.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Pp/Ps (mean pulmonary artery pressure/mean systemic blood pressure ratio) improved from 0.72 to 0.59 after inhalation of iloprost.
